name: platformer fp gamedev [omori]
description: this is my final project for my game development subject and yes it's heavily inspired by the original game OMORI. It's my favourite game and I took this chance to try and make a fan game ww. Check out omocat too!! She and the devs were the one who make the masterpiece OMORI. Everything (characters/art/music) is owned by omocat. :D
